titleStmt.title: A brief remembrancer, or, The right improvement of Christ's birth-day.
titleStmt.author: T. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.T. and R.H. for William Miller at the Gilded Acorn in S. Pauls Church-Yard, near the Little North door,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "The glorious day doth now begin to dawn ..."
Imperfect: cropped at foot affecting imprint; date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
